marklogic.body: THIS IS A MESSAGE TO ANY MUSLIM READING THIS: I have killed many of yourpeople, I have raped your women and children and killed them as well, Ihave Burned Qurans andÂ desecratedÂ the bodies of dead Muslims. I force fed aÂ woman her daughters eye balls and let the child live parentless andÂ blind with my name Burned into her forehead. We set up shop in an Iraqishouse and made him and his wife watch as we brutally raped his fifteenÂ year old daughter repeatedly for week before eventually hacking all herÂ limbs Off while she was alive and letting her Bleed out. A hail ofÂ gunfire sent the parents to hell. I have more repect for a cockroachÂ than an arab or muslim. Burn in hell you cunts.
